org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.validation
Interface IAeBaseErrorReporter

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAeDeploymentLogger, IAeErrorReporter
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeDeploymentLog, AeDeploymentValidator, AeErrorReporter, AeErrorReporterConsole, AeTeeDeploymentLogger
public interface IAeBaseErrorReporter

Interface for reporting errors and warnings found during the analysis of a deployment plan or bpel process.

Method Summary
 void addError(java.lang.String aErrorCode, java.lang.Object[] aArgs, java.lang.Object aNode)
          Add an error code to the collection of errors for a given node.
 void addInfo(java.lang.String aInfoCode, java.lang.Object[] aArgs, java.lang.Object aNode)
          Add information to the collection of info for a given node.
 void addWarning(java.lang.String aWarnCode, java.lang.Object[] aArgs, java.lang.Object aNode)
          Add a warning code to the collection of warnings for a given node.
 boolean hasErrors()
          Returns true if any errors were encountered.
 boolean hasWarnings()
          Returns true if any warnings were encountered.
 

Method Detail

addInfo

public void addInfo(java.lang.String aInfoCode,
                    java.lang.Object[] aArgs,
                    java.lang.Object aNode)
Add information to the collection of info for a given node.

Parameters:
aInfoCode - The information code of the info to add.
aArgs - Object array containing substitution args for '{n}'s.
aNode - The node to which the information refers.

addError

public void addError(java.lang.String aErrorCode,
                     java.lang.Object[] aArgs,
                     java.lang.Object aNode)
Add an error code to the collection of errors for a given node.

Parameters:
aErrorCode - The error code of the error to add.
aArgs - Object array containing substitution args for '{n}'s.
aNode - The node on which the error occurred.

addWarning

public void addWarning(java.lang.String aWarnCode,
                       java.lang.Object[] aArgs,
                       java.lang.Object aNode)
Add a warning code to the collection of warnings for a given node.

Parameters:
aWarnCode - The warning code of the warning to add.
aArgs - Object array containing substitution args for '{n}'s.
aNode - The node on which the warning occurred.

hasErrors

public boolean hasErrors()
Returns true if any errors were encountered.

hasWarnings

public boolean hasWarnings()
Returns true if any warnings were encountered.
